   1: 
   2: module bsg_dff #(width_p=-1
   3: 		 ,harden_p=0
   4: 		 ,strength_p=1   // set drive strength
   5: 		 )
   6:    (input   clk_i
   7:     ,input  [width_p-1:0] data_i
   8:     ,output [width_p-1:0] data_o
   9:     );
  10: 
  11:    reg [width_p-1:0] data_r;
  12: 
  13:    assign data_o = data_r;
  14: 
  15:    always @(posedge clk_i)
  16:      data_r <= data_i;
  17: 
  18: endmodule
